'''A Seat of Sophisticated Luxury''' is an event-exclusive [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be obtained from the [[Genshin Impact × Cadillac]] and [[Genshin Impact × Pizza Hut]] (2023) events.
